p: Patients were ineligible if they had a central nervous system (CNS) disease, active uncontrolled bacterial, viral or fungal infections, or severe organ dysfunction, including a left ventricular ejection fraction < 40% and alanine transaminase (ALT)/aspartate transaminase (AST) > 2.5× the upper normal limit. The comorbidity index of each patient was calculated using the hematopoietic cell transplantation-comorbidity index system.
